channel.title: Hydra on minoru's Emacs Configuration

item.title: 8.1. hydra-menu
item.description: hydra-menu „ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Çè„Å∞ÁßÅ„ÅÆÁßòÊõ∏„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™ÂΩπÂâ≤„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ ‰æøÂÆú‰∏ä„ÄÅquick-menu„Å®work-menu „Å´ÂàÜ„Åë„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Å©„Å°„Çâ„Åã„Çâ„Åß„ÇÇÁõ∏‰∫í„Å´Âëº„Å≥Âá∫„Åõ„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ [hydra-quick-menu] hydra-quick-menu Á∑®ÈõÜ‰ΩúÊ•≠„ÅßÈ†ªÁπÅ„Å´„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„Åô„Çã„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„ÅÆ„Éá„Ç£„É¨„ÇØ„Éà„É™„Çí‰∏ÄÁô∫„ÅßÈñã„Åè„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„Ç∑„Éß„Éº„Éà„Ç´„ÉÉ„Éà„ÇíË®≠ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ „Çà„Åè‰Ωø„ÅÜ„Ç¢„Éó„É™Ëµ∑Âãï„ÅÆ„Ç∑„Éß„Éº„Éà„Ç´„ÉÉ„Éà„Å™„Å©„ÇÇË®≠ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Åè„Å®‰æøÂà©„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ (leaf *hydra-quick-menu :bind ("M-." . hydra-quick/body) :hydra (hydra-quick (:hint nil :exit t) " ÔÉ§ Quick Menu ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- _d_ropbox _e_macs.d^^ _i_nits _x_srv.jp^^^^ GH:_h_ root:_/_ _s_rc _._files howm:_@__,_ _m_d:_p_view _z_illa _r_estart magit_[__]_ _t_ramp _y_as:_n_:_v_ _j_unk _b_rowse _o_rg _<home>_ _c_ompile^^ make:_k_._g_ _a_g:üêæ " ("a" counsel-ag) ("o" my:org-dir) ("t" counsel-tramp) ("q" my:tramp-quit) ("<home>" my:home-dir) ("d" my:dropbox) ("." my:dotfiles-dir) ("i" my:inits-dir) ("e" my:emacs-dir) ("h" my:gh-dir) ("x" my:xsrv-dir) ("y" company-yasnippet) ("n" yas/new-snippet) ("v" yas/visit-snippet-file) ("r" restart-emacs) ("m" hydra-markdown/body) ("p" livedown-preview) ("w" livedown-kill) ("b" hydra-browse/body) ("c" hydra-make/body) ("-" my:github-show) ("@" howm-list-all) ("," howm-remember) ("j" open-junk-file) ("J" open-last-junk-file) ("k" my:make-k) ("g" my:make-git) ("/" my:root-dir) ("_" my:delete-other-windows) ("[" git-timemachine-toggle) ("]" magit-status) ("s" my:scr-dir) ("l" my:open-capture) (":" view-mode) ("z" filezilla) ("M-.

item.title: 8.2. hydra-make
item.description: [hydra-make] ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;; Make command configurations ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; (leaf *user-make-configulation :mode (("\\.mak\\'" "makefile\\'") . makefile-mode) :hydra (hydra-make (:hint nil :exit t) " ÔàÜ make:_k_ _u_psftp _m_ove _d_raft _b_klog _g_it _s_ort _c_lean üêæ " ("k" my:make-k) ("u" my:make-upsftp) ("m" my:make-move) ("d" my:make-draft) ("b" my:make-bklog) ("g" my:make-git) ("s" my:make-sort) ("c" my:make-clean) ("<muhenkan>" nil)) :init (setq compilation-scroll-output t) (setq compilation-always-kill t) (setq compilation-finish-functions 'compile-autoclose) (defun compile-autoclose (buffer string) "Automatically close the compilation buffer." (cond ((string-match "finished" string) (bury-buffer "*compilation*") (delete-other-windows) (message "Build successful.

item.title: 8.3. hydra-package
item.description: ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;; Hydra for package utils ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; (leaf package-utils :ensure t :chord ("p@" . hydra-package/body) :hydra (hydra-package (:color red :hint nil) " üì¶ Package: _m_elpa _i_nstall upgrade:_l_ist._n_ame._a_ll _r_emove _e_l-get " ("i" package-install) ("l" package-utils-list-upgrades) ("n" package-utils-upgrade-by-name) ("r" package-utils-remove-by-name) ("a" package-utils-upgrade-all-and-restart) ("m" package-list-packages) ("e" select-elget-command) ("<muhenkan>" nil)) :preface (defun select-elget-command () "Narrow the only el-get command in `M-x'." (interactive) (counsel-M-x "^el-get ")))

item.title: 8.4. hydra-markdown
item.description: [hydra-markdown] (leaf *hydra-markdown :hydra (hydra-markdown (:color red :hint nil) " ÔÅÄ Markdown: _i_talic Ê∂àÁ∑ö:_x_ foot_n_ote _t_able _m_arkup pre_v_iew md2:_p_df:_d_ocx" ("i" markdown-insert-italic) ("x" markdown-insert-strike-through) ("t" markdown-insert-table) ("n" markdown-insert-footnote) ("m" markdown-toggle-markup-hiding) ("v" livedown-preview) ;; Pndoc ("p" md2pdf) ("d" md2docx) ("<muhenkan>" nil)) :init (leaf emacs-livedown :el-get shime/emacs-livedown) (custom-set-variables '(markdown-toc-user-toc-structure-manipulation-fn 'cdr)) :config (defun md2pdf () "Generate pdf from currently open markdown." (interactive) (let ((filename (buffer-file-name (current-buffer)))) ;; Use wkhtmltopdf without latex (shell-command-to-string (concat "pandoc " filename " -f markdown -t html5 -o " (file-name-sans-extension filename) ".

item.title: 8.5. hydra-view-mode
item.description: [hydra-view-mode] view-mode„ÅÆ„Éò„É´„ÉóÊ©üËÉΩ vew-mode „Åß„Éê„ÉÉ„Éï„Ç°„Éº„ÇíÈñã„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å®„Åç„ÄÅ[.]/[?] „Ç≠„Éº„ÇíÊâì„Å§„Åì„Å®„Åßhydra„ÅåÁô∫Âãï„Åô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;; hydra view mode ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; (leaf *hydra-view-mode :hydra (hydra-view (:color red :hint nil) " ÔÉ§ View mode -----------------------^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^------------------------------------------------------------ _x_:del-chra _u_:undo winner:_[__]_ _s_wiper ÔÖ∫:_o_._0_._1_._2_ _%_:paren ÔÄé_-__\/__+_ help_._ _d_:del-line _y_:yank x_r_efüêæ_RET_ _g_oogle _w_:for-word^^^^^^ _@_:point _m_agit^^^^ ex_i_t_:_ " ("r" xref-find-references) ("RET" xref-find-definitions) ("x" my:view-del-char) ("w" forward-word) ("d" my:view-kill-region) ("y" my:view-yank) ("u" my:view-undo) ("[" winner-undo) ("]" winner-redo) ("n" my:org-view-next-heading) ("p" my:org-view-previous-heading) ("%" my:jump-brace) ("@" counsel-mark-ring) ("i" View-exit-and-edit :exit t) (":" View-exit-and-edit :exit t) ("s" swiper-thing-at-point) ("m" magit-status) ("g" my:google) ("o" other-window-or-split) ("0" my:delete-window) ("1" my:delete-other-windows) ("2" my:split-window-below) ("3" my:split-window-right) ("+" text-scale-increase) ("-" text-scale-decrease) ("/" (text-scale-set 0)) (".

item.title: 8.6. hydra-browse
item.description: ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;; Hydra for favorite utils ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; (leaf *hydra-browse :hydra (hydra-browse (:hint nil :exit t) " ^ÔÅ∫ Shop^ ^Ôâª SNS^ ^üîÉ Repos^ ^ÔÄ≠ Blog^ ^Ôáç Life^ ^Ôäæ Social^ ^ÔÇõ Github^ ÔÜ†oogle ^^^^^^^^------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ _A_: Amazon _t_: Twitter _d_: Dropbox _g_: ghub.io _j_: Jorudan _k_: Keep _1_: minorugh _5_: Translate _R_: Rakuten _y_: Youtube _f_: Flickr _x_: xsrv.jp _n_: News _p_: Pocket _2_: gist _6_: Map _Y_: Yodobashi _I_: Instagram _G_: Gdrive _e_: Essay _w_: Weather _q_: Qiita _3_: explore _7_: Earth _K_: Kakaku _T_: Tumblr _X_: Xserver _b_: Blog _S_: SanyoBas _s_: Slack _4_: Centaur _8_: Photo " ("A" (browse-url "https://www.
